Description.0: Continuous Assessment: Students will complete 2 300 word discussion posts exploring critically assessing Irish Value Chains from local to National level.
Description.1: Continuous Assessment: Case Study: European Best practice exemplar of bioresource and technology deployment for the creation of new value chains or the elevation and diversification of existing value chains (3000 words).
Description.2: Continuous Assessment: Workshops and collaboration: Opportunity Scoping: New value chain development from Biomass to Biobased Product.
